name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Souzou
summary: Celebrating 30 years of Nobunaga's Ambition, Nobunaga No Yabou: Souzou is a milestone title bringing enhanced features to this venerable historical simulation strategy series; video game tacticians around the world will welcome this addition as Souzou tells the story of the famous Nobunaga Oda, an ambitious 16th century Japanese ruler the with the desire for a unified Japan.
